Select Press for A Hero Never Fails at Freight + Volume

Posted on Aug 25, 2011 in Art Updates | No Comments

The press response for my show A Hero Never Fails has been stellar. Here are a few of the must reads:


Art in Review by
Ken Johnson

 

Best in Show by Robert Shuster

 

Giving up on Underdog,
an Interview by Mayukh Sen

 


Installation Artists at Chelsea Gallery…
by Alison Martin

 

 

A Hero Never Fails is on view through September 10th, 2011.

Freight + Volume

530 W. 24th St.

New York, NY
